name: Wobbly Warbler
description:
Art, Design: Danielle Yoseloff
Code, Design, Music: Eric Freeman

Fight your way to the top of the tree!

Attacking enemies increases their instability giving you a higher chance of knocking them off the branch. Make sure to time your jumps over incoming attacks or risk being knocked off the tree yourself.

Your peck attack is fast but weak, the wing attack is medium speed and medium damage, and your tail attack is slow but deals lots of damage. However, the knockoff chance is weighted based on instability % (number at the top) and type of damage (so slow attacks have a higher chance of knocking opponent off). Additionally, slower attacks have a higher chance of interrupting the opponent’s current attack.

And be careful! The enemies get harder as you go up branches. They learn more moves (like jumping over attacks or dashing forward/backwards) and also deal more damage, are more aggressive, and more! Will you make it to the top of the tree?

Keyboard / Controller Supported

WSAD/Right Stick - Move
R/Start - Continue/Restart
Left Shift/X - Peck
Left Control/Y - Wing
Left Alt/B - Tail

Made in under 3 days for Ludum Dare 49. Theme: Unstable

Warning: WebGL version may require it run in fullscreen. There are also issues with audio playback and mixer effects. We recommend the downloadable version instead.
